snippet: The contracts include millions for work on beaches, for equipment and repairs, and to provide relief to victims.
abstract: New York City approves $85.4 million in emergency contracts to repair damage caused by Hurricane Sandy, buy equipment to respond to the disaster, and provide relief to its victims.
lead_paragraph: The contracts include millions for work on beaches, for equipment and repairs, and to provide relief to victims.

headline.seo: City Approves $85.4 Million for Hurricane Response
headline.main: City Approves Contracts for Storm Cleanup
headline.print_headline: City Grants Approval To Contracts For Cleanup
